creditline: Gift of Dr. Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
description: two panels; sewn together; red-orange, yellow, brown and blue geometric ikat pattern; brown and yellow stripes along most of each long end; yellow triangles and stripe along each short end; oblong yellow shapes with brown, blue and red-orange geometric shapes inside; yellow, red-orange, brown and blue arrow-like shapes with chevron wing-like decoration on each side of shaft; two brown and red-orange stripes at other end of each arrow; triangles, diamonds and squares around and between arrow designs; short fringe along short ends
title: Ceremonial hanging (paporitonoling)
